channel.title: Stripe on Simon Gilbert Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Stripe on Simon Gilbert Blog

item.title: Cross-Platform (PCI Compliant) Credit Card Payments using Stripe - C# ASP.Net MVC Core
item.description: Need to process credit card payments in your code? Simon Gilbert explains how to accept PCI Compliant card payments using the leading payment provider Stripe, and C# ASP.Net MVC Core in Visual Studio for Mac.
